alert.note: Alert for Bailey; Cochran; Hockley; Lamb; Terry; Yoakum (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 12:55AM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Bailey, eastern Cochran, western Terry, Hockley, Yoakum and Lamb Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 1255 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Progress to 3 miles southeast of Morton to 7 miles west of Denver City. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Levelland, Littlefield, Muleshoe, Denver City, Morton, Plains, Earth, Sundown, Sudan, Amherst, Needmore, Fieldton, Progress, Tokio, Enochs, Whitharral, Bula, Muleshoe Wildlife Refuge, Pep and Lehman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bailey; Cochran; Hockley; Lamb; Terry; Yoakum
